name: European Pain Federation EFIC
legal: International non-profit organization by virtue of a Belgian Royal Decree of 1999
goal:
We aim to advance research, education, and clinical management of pain and serve as an authoritative, science-based resource on issues related to pain and its treatment.

Develop educational programmes to improve pain knowledge amongst healthcare practitioners

Raise awareness of the importance of pain, including its management, treatment and prevention, amongst patients and the general public

Engage in research projects and disseminate research funding, in order to advance the scientific understanding of pain

Lobby politicians to improve policies that affect pain and to increase funding for pain in public research programmes

Organise the largest scientific congress on pain in Europe, showcasing the latest research and clinical management approaches
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Any policies regarding pain management, Chronic disease and cancer policies, Health workforce planning, EU-OSHA prevention of pain recommendations, Horizon Europe calls and projects related to pain,
